Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* - New Incognito Mode Button: Added a red heart icon button for Incognito Mode that pauses all connections except to party members, providing enhanced privacy control
* - Improved Update Check System: Enhanced automatic update notifications with better reliability and user experience
* - Improved Acknowledge System: Enhanced reliability and performance of the acknowledgment system
* - Bug fixes and stability improvements
